title: suspended
body:
i was suspended until 29/09/2016 20.34 its 22.43 now still cant play, whats up with that rito???????????????
anybady have a clue whats going on?

replies.body: The time of suspension is based on Pacific time and not local.  It looks like there's still a few hours lift until access is restored.  Best of luck!
The time you are banned until is likely PDT, as that is the timezone that Riot HQ is in. it is currently 14:00 PDT, so you have about 6.5 more hours left.

damm, i honestly thought of that buth i didnt want i to be true xDDD
thx anyway
